remarks: Every function converges uniformly on the empty set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ulm0.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
ulm0.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
ulm0.f $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> ( CC ^m S ) ) $.
ulm0.g $e |- ( ph -> G : S --> CC ) $.
ulm0 $p |- ( ( ph /\ S = (/) ) -> F ( ~~>u ` S ) G ) $.
